name: Risky Relation
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

The blue dots are your minions.
You control them with the power of the control crystals.

Hold down the left mouse button and hover over them to select them. Once you release the button, they will start walking towards the position of your mouse.

  • When they find an item, they will pick it up and bring it to your tower
  • When the find an ore, they begin to mine it

There are two items:

  • Gold - used to purchase items in the shop 
  • Crystals - refill your power to control the minions

You can purchase items by holding down the middle mouse button, which will open the shop, and selecting the item by hovering over it. Then release the button. The two things you can buy are:

  • Minion - you can buy a new minion for the cost of 50 gold
  • Delivery point - minions will deliver the items to the tower or the closest delivery point. Costs 120 gold 

If you don't refill your control power, the minions will try to escape their captivity by spawning two different types of enemies:

  • Item stealer - picks up items and throws them into the closest pool of lava
  • Tower damager - attacks your tower

If your tower reaches 0 health, you loose!

Gain enough power and the enemies will start to blink. Use your beam on them to defeat them.

 CAMERA CONTROL:

You have two ways to control the camera:

  • Hold down the right mouse button to move into the direction of the cursor
  • Use the arrow keys to move

 KNOWN ISSUES:

  • issue: minions cannot be selected
    fix: press 'r'
  • issue: minions still cannot be selected and game lags
    fix: press 'r' multiple times
  • issue: minions don't stop walking around
    fix: press 'r'
